      protected Selector RuleBuilderBase.value(Object defaultValue)
      returns a constant selector that returns the given value and nothing else
      protected Selector RuleBuilderBase.value(Object context, String property) 
      protected Selector RuleBuilderBase.value(String defaultOrEnv)
      returns a constant selector that returns the given value or the value of the environment variable, if the string has following format "${name}"
